verses.text: \w I|strong="H1980"\w* \w will|strong="H6440"\w* bless \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w* \w at|strong="H1732"\w* \w all|strong="H6440"\w* \w times|strong="H6440"\w*: \w His|strong="H1732"\w* praise \w shall|strong="H6440"\w* \w continually|strong="H1980"\w* \w be|strong="H6440"\w* \w in|strong="H1980"\w* \w my|strong="H1732"\w* \w mouth|strong="H6440"\w*.

\w My|strong="H3605"\w* soul \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* make \w her|strong="H3605"\w* \w boast|strong="H1288"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w*: \w The|strong="H3605"\w* meek \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* hear \w thereof|strong="H6310"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* glad.

Oh magnify \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H5315"\w*, \w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w let|strong="H8055"\w* \w us|strong="H8085"\w* exalt \w his|strong="H3068"\w* name \w together|strong="H8085"\w*.

\w I|strong="H3068"\w* sought \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* answered \w me|strong="H7311"\w*, \w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w delivered|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H7311"\w* \w from|strong="H3068"\w* \w all|strong="H3162"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* fears.

\w They|strong="H3068"\w* \w looked|strong="H3068"\w* \w unto|strong="H3068"\w* \w him|strong="H3605"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w were|strong="H3068"\w* radiant; \w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* faces \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* never \w be|strong="H3068"\w* confounded.

\w This|strong="H6440"\w* poor \w man|strong="H6440"\w* cried, \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w* heard \w him|strong="H6440"\w*, \w And|strong="H6440"\w* saved \w him|strong="H6440"\w* \w out|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w all|strong="H6440"\w* \w his|strong="H6440"\w* troubles.

\w The|strong="H3605"\w* angel \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w* encampeth round \w about|strong="H8085"\w* \w them|strong="H7121"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* fear \w him|strong="H7121"\w*, \w And|strong="H3068"\w* delivereth \w them|strong="H7121"\w*.

Oh taste \w and|strong="H3068"\w* see \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* good: Blessed \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* man \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w taketh|strong="H3068"\w* refuge \w in|strong="H2583"\w* \w him|strong="H5439"\w*.

Oh fear \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w*, \w ye|strong="H7200"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* saints; \w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w there|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w no|strong="H7200"\w* want \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w them|strong="H7200"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* fear \w him|strong="H7200"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3588"\w* young lions \w do|strong="H3068"\w* \w lack|strong="H4270"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* suffer hunger; \w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* seek \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3588"\w* \w want|strong="H4270"\w* \w any|strong="H3588"\w* good \w thing|strong="H3588"\w*.

Come, \w ye|strong="H3808"\w* children, hearken \w unto|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H1875"\w*: \w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* teach \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* fear \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w What|strong="H8085"\w* \w man|strong="H1121"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w that|strong="H8085"\w* desireth life, \w And|strong="H1121"\w* loveth \add many\add* days, \w that|strong="H8085"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w may|strong="H3068"\w* see good?
\w Keep|strong="H7200"\w* \w thy|strong="H7200"\w* tongue \w from|strong="H3117"\w* evil, \w And|strong="H3117"\w* \w thy|strong="H7200"\w* lips \w from|strong="H3117"\w* speaking guile.
Depart \w from|strong="H7451"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w*, \w and|strong="H1696"\w* \w do|strong="H8193"\w* good; Seek peace, \w and|strong="H1696"\w* pursue \w it|strong="H5341"\w*.

\w The|strong="H6213"\w* eyes \w of|strong="H6213"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w* \w are|strong="H6213"\w* \w toward|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* righteous, \w And|strong="H6213"\w* \w his|strong="H5493"\w* ears \w are|strong="H6213"\w* \add open\add* \w unto|strong="H6213"\w* \w their|strong="H1245"\w* cry.

\w The|strong="H3068"\w* \w face|strong="H5869"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w against|strong="H3068"\w* \w them|strong="H3068"\w* \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w do|strong="H3068"\w* evil, \w To|strong="H3068"\w* cut off \w the|strong="H3068"\w* remembrance \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w them|strong="H3068"\w* \w from|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* earth.

\add The righteous\add* cried, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w* heard, \w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w delivered|strong="H3068"\w* \w them|strong="H6440"\w* \w out|strong="H6213"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w all|strong="H6213"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w troubles|strong="H7451"\w*.

\w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* nigh \w unto|strong="H3068"\w* \w them|strong="H8085"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w are|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* broken \w heart|strong="H8085"\w*, \w And|strong="H3068"\w* saveth \w such|strong="H3605"\w* \w as|strong="H3068"\w* \w are|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* contrite spirit.

Many \w are|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* afflictions \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* righteous; \w But|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w* delivereth \w him|strong="H3068"\w* out \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w them|strong="H7665"\w* \w all|strong="H3467"\w*.

\w He|strong="H3068"\w* keepeth \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* bones: \w Not|strong="H7451"\w* \w one|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w them|strong="H5337"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* broken.

Evil \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* slay \w the|strong="H3605"\w* wicked; \w And|strong="H8104"\w* \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* hate \w the|strong="H3605"\w* righteous \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* condemned.

\w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w* redeemeth \w the|strong="H4191"\w* soul \w of|strong="H4191"\w* \w his|strong="H8130"\w* servants; \w And|strong="H4191"\w* none \w of|strong="H4191"\w* \w them|strong="H8130"\w* \w that|strong="H7451"\w* take refuge \w in|strong="H4191"\w* \w him|strong="H4191"\w* \w shall|strong="H7563"\w* \w be|strong="H4191"\w* \w condemned|strong="H7563"\w*.
